0.1.0.name: wordpress/wp-apply-timezone
0.1.0.description:
Adds the option to apply the current blog's timezone retroactively to existing posts.

Useful if you had the wrong timezone set for a period. Creates an "Apply Timezone" option to the Edit Post Bulk Action menu.

This plugin has had limited testing. Make a full BACKUP before installing. The plugin has worked fine for me, but it comes with no guarantee whatsoever. Please be careful. You can use the WP-DB-Backup.
